tooltip.mineria.water_barrel.use: Can be filled or emptied by interacting with buckets.
tooltip.mineria.water_barrel.small_inven: This barrel has a small inventory of 8 slots.
tooltip.mineria.water_barrel.view_capaci: Sneak + Click to see the capacity of the barrel.
tooltip.mineria.water_barrel.store_lava: This barrel can store any fluid, but only one type of fluid at a time.
tooltip.mineria.water_barrel.store_potio: This barrel has an inventory that can only store potions and teas.
tooltip.mineria.water_barrel.upgrades: Various upgrades can be applied to this barrel.
tooltip.mineria.barrel_inventory_upgrade: Adds 8 inventory slots to the barrel.
tooltip.mineria.barrel_fluid_upgrade: Allows the user to store any type of fluid in the barrel.
tooltip.mineria.barrel_storage_upgrade_1: Increases the fluid storage of the barrel by 16.
tooltip.mineria.barrel_storage_upgrade_2: Increases the fluid storage of the barrel by 32.
tooltip.mineria.barrel_storage_upgrade_3: Increases the fluid storage of the barrel by 64.
tooltip.mineria.barrel_pumping_upgrade: When the barrel is placed near a fluid it can handle, it will automatically pump it (200 ticks for 1 bucket, each additional upgrade reduces by half the time required).
tooltip.mineria.barrel_netherite_upgrade: Makes the barrel item fire resistant (meaning it won't burn in lava or fire).
tooltip.mineria.only_for_diamond_fluid_b: Only for fluid/water barrels that accept upgrades (e.g. Diamond Fluid Barrel).
tooltip.mineria.apothecarium.wip: This feature is still in development

mineria.apothecarium.plants.nettle.infus: §9Absorption I for 2:00 and Regeneration II for 0:05
mineria.apothecarium.plants.rhubarb.infu:
§9Removes after 10 seconds every potion effect including class I poisonings present since at least 1 minute and at most 2 minutes.
§cAfter this cure, the player will have bowel sounds for 2 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.senna.infuse:
§9Removes after 10 seconds every potion effect including class I and II poisonings present since at least 1 minute and at most 2 minutes.
§cAfter this cure, the player will have bowel sounds for 2 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.senna_bush.i:
§9Removes after 10 seconds every potion effect including class I and II poisonings present since at least 1 minute and at most 2 minutes.
§cAfter this cure, the player will have bowel sounds for 2 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.elderberry_b:
§c1st application: nausea I for 0:30
2nd application: nausea I for 1:00
3rd application: Elderberry poisoning of class I
§0Note: the poison exposure is cancelled after 45 seconds with no application.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.strychnos_nu:
§c1st application: Strychnos Nux-Vomica poisoning of class I
2nd application: poisoning of class II
3rd application: poisoning of class III
§0Note: the poison exposure is cancelled after 5 minutes with no application.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.belladonna.i:
§c1st application: Belladonna poisoning of class II
2nd application: nothing
3rd application: poisoning of class III
§0Note: application count is only reset after the active poisoning is cured.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.mandrake.inf:
§c1st application: Mandrake poisoning of class II
2nd application: Mandrake poisoning of class III
§0Note: application count is only reset after the active poisoning is cured.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.lycium_chine: §9Regeneration II for 0:20 with Resistance I for 0:10 and Absorption I for 0:30
mineria.apothecarium.plants.saussurea_co: No tea can be infused with Saussurea Costus.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.schisandra_c: §9Night Vision for 2:00 and Speed III for 1:30
mineria.apothecarium.plants.pulsatilla_c: No tea can be infused with Pulsatilla Chinensis.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.spruce_yew_s: No tea can be infused with Yew Berries.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.rhubarb.othe: 2nd ingredient of the catholicon (made in the distiller).
mineria.apothecarium.plants.senna.other_: 1st ingredient of the catholicon (made in the distiller).
mineria.apothecarium.plants.senna_bush.o: Variant for the 1st ingredient of the catholicon (made in the distiller).
mineria.apothecarium.plants.elderberry_b: Elderberries can be traded with the Apothecary Villager and with Druids.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.strychnos_nu: Single ingredient of the nauseous anti-poison (made in the distiller).
mineria.apothecarium.plants.mandrake.oth: Mandrake roots can be obtained with a Billhook. These can be infused into Mandrake Root Tea.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.saussurea_co: Saussurea Costus roots can be obtained with a Billhook. These can be infused into Saussurea Costus Root Tea.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.pulsatilla_c: Pulsatilla Chinensis roots can be obtained with a Billhook. These can be infused into Pulsatilla Chinensis Root Tea.
mineria.apothecarium.plants.spruce_yew_s: Yew berries can be traded with Druids and can be used to obtain bonuses when trading with them.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.catholi: Senna tea infused with Rhubarb or vice versa in an Infuser.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.charcoa: Julep with Charcoal Dust in a Distiller.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.milk_an: Julep with a Milk Bucket in a Distiller.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.milk_bu: Milk a Cow with an empty bucket.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.nauseou: Julep with Strychnos Nux-Vomica in a Distiller.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.anti_po: Julep with Ginger then Cinnamon Dust in a Distiller.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.miracle: Can only be obtained when traiding with the Apothecary Villager or Druids.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.mandrak: Mandrake Root with water in an Infuser.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.saussur: Saussurea Costus Root with water in an Infuser.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.pulsati: Pulsatilla Chinensis Root with water in an Infuser.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.scalpel: Iron Sword combined with an Iron Ingot in a Smithing Table.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.catholi: Removes class I and II poisonings that were applied since more than 30 seconds and less than 5 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.charcoa: Removes class I poisonings that were applied since less than 3 minutes and class II poisonings that were applied since less than 2 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.milk_an: Removes class I poisonings that were applied since less than 2 minutes and class II poisonings that were applied since less that 1 minute.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.milk_bu: Removes class I poisonings that were applied since less than 1 minutes and class II poisonings that were applied since less that 30 seconds.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.nauseou: Removes class I poisonings applied since less than 5 minutes, class II poisonings applied since less that 3 minutes and class III poisonings applied since less than 1 minute.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.anti_po: Removes class I and II poisonings applied since more than 30 seconds and less than 10 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.mandrak: Removes class I poisonings applied since less than 1 minute and mandrake poisonings applied since less than 5 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.saussur: Reduces nausea caused from poison and removes nausea from class 0 poisonings. Also greatly reduces bowel sounds and removes them if there is only one minute left. Applies Health Boost I for 2 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.pulsati: Removes all bowel sounds and nausea. Applies Regeneration IV for 10 seconds.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.scalpel: Crouch to use. Cures poisonings of class 1 with 30% chance, class 2 with 15%, class 3 with 7.5%.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.catholi: Laxative Drink. When drank, the player will be victim of bowel sounds for 4 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.charcoa: Laxative Drink. Restricts the usage of laxative drinks for 10 minutes.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.milk_an: Removes existing restrictions on laxative drinks.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.milk_bu: Removes existing restrictions on laxative drinks.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.nauseou: When drank, the player will have extreme nausea for 10 seconds.
mineria.apothecarium.anti-poison.scalpel: Can apply hunger with 20% chance and slowness with 40% chance. Can be used on other players if they also crouch.
mineria.apothecarium.druid_rites.boss_su: I - Great Druid of Gauls summoning
Find a ritual structure located in Dark Forests.
Cartographer villagers sell ritual structure locator maps.
Place Blue Glowstone above each of the Elementary Stones, then interact with the Ritual Table to begin the ritual.
Five Druids are required to start the ritual. If some are missing, refer to the Druid summoning ritual (II).
Once all the druids gathered, place the following items in the following order on the Ritual Table:
After the items were consumed, drink the potion that the leading Druid will throw you.
You have to drink this potion in the following minute otherwise the ritual will be cancelled and all your sacrificed resources will be lost!
You may take a curative drink such as a milk bucket to cure yourself from the effects of the potion.
Distance yourself from the ritual table and prepare for combat! The Great Druid of Gauls will appear and all the Druids from the rituals and the surroundings will start attacking you!
mineria.apothecarium.druid_rites.druid_s: As for all druid rituals, find a ritual structure.
Place a Vanadium Ingot on the ritual table. Wait a few seconds and a Druid will spawn.
This ritual doesn't require Blue Glowstone above the elementary stones.
mineria.apothecarium.elementary_beings.f: A very dangerous and unstable entity made of an unknown rock capable of spreading flames everywhere!
The Fire Golem sets fire everywhere he walks. It also vaporizes the water around it every minute.
mineria.apothecarium.elementary_beings.d: A direct manifestation of Nature itself. Don't be fooled by its appearance, the dirt on his body is only a cover for the strong material that makes up his body!
In addition with being very resistant, the Dirt Golem fertilizes the grass and crops in its surroundings every 30 seconds.
mineria.apothecarium.elementary_beings.a: A volatile entity which flows in the air, making 98% of its composition. Who thought air could be compacted this much?
It can shoot arrows and can easily fly away from you. After getting hit 5 times, it becomes almost invisible for 3 seconds.
mineria.apothecarium.elementary_beings.w: A being purely made of liquid water with the same properties as a solid (impenetrable). Beware, as it can flow very fast!
The Water Spirit applies a slowness effect when hitting an entity. It can be frozen with snowballs, which will greatly slow him down. However stay at distance, as it can freeze you back.
